name: appsolute GmbH
description:
Appsolute GmbH was founded in 2009. Holger Meyer, a dedicated programmer, is the sole owner and managing director. He has been active in the software industry for more than 25 years. The company is characterized by flexible and goal-oriented processes. A flat hierarchy means any decision path is short and precise.
Even prior to Apple opening the App store in 2008, ushering in the mobile revolution, Holger Meyer had developed his first mobile app for the iPhone. Steadily growing demand – appsolute GmbH has proven it can produce apps with increasing complexity for the App Store.
READ MORE...
